short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly open Shopify Admin for product, collection, and pages from the storefront.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly open Shopify Admin for products, collections, and pages from the storefront. You must have access to the Stores Admin to use this extension.
